name: Explosive Firearm Ammunition
entries: General explosive ammunition for firearms enhanced with explosive compounds.
The weapon deals its normal damage, and gains 5 explosive (or +10 explosive if the weapon was already explosive). The explosive damage dealt by this ammunition is halved.

entries.name: Explosive
entries: Upon a hit, everything but the targeted creature within a radius determined by its explosive value of the target takes additional damage equal to the weaponâ€™s damage roll. If the weapon attack misses, the explosive ammunition fails to detonate. Inanimate objects take double damage die from Explosive weapons. Explosive weapons have their misfire score increased by 1.
